channel.title: Midiplayback in sync with audio
channel.description:
Hi there.
I have just got the board and want to use it to run some installations.
So I need something which can play 40 minutes of midi in sync with an audio stream from the SD-card.
I have been looking in to the table object for the midi, but it seems like its only having one dimension and I need more to store the time, note, velocity and channel.
Any ideas how to break the nut?
Cheers
Mikkel

item.title: Midiplayback in sync with audio
item.dc:creator: @SirPrimalform
item.description:
@SirPrimalform wrote:

Well, you can effectively have more dimensions for the table by adding more tables of the same size and using the same index to look up from all of them.

Read full topic
